title: FS - Four Raw Chicago Cubs - Brown, Needham, Schultz, &amp; Sheckard
author: jpittman765

posts.post_title: FS - Four Raw Chicago Cubs - Brown, Needham, Schultz, &amp; Sheckard
posts.post_content:
Mordecai Brown (Piedmont 150) is very sharp, but the card was trimmed about 1/16 inch, at the top- SOLD

Thomas Needham (Sweet Cap 350) is also clean, with slight crease top left - $85, now $77

James Sheckard (Piedmont 150) is clean with slight crease left to right - $70, now $65

Frank Shulte (Piedmont 350) is crisp and clean - $90, now $81

PayPal F&F preferred, but I will accept regular PayPal if you are uncomfortable with family and friends. 

Shipping is $4 card, but free with purchase of more than one card.
